1.content: Now then, to start things off, do you want to go for one of the female humans in Steven Universe, or do you prefer one of the Gems instead?
1.title: Choosing A Character

12.content: Ah, so you're a fan of the Gem characters, hmm? Well why not? Now then, which Gem do you choose?
12.title: Gems, please!

choices: I'm just a simple ordinary human
121.content: Oh, you want the lovely Lapis Lazuli? Well, can't say I blame you. After all, Lapis's backstory is a tragic and sympathetic one, making her a favorite amongst fans of the show. Now then, are you a normal human, or are you someone with superpowers?
121.title: Lapis Lazuli

choices: Take it slowly by snuggling with her and playing with her wings.
1211.content: When you first saw her you were amazed by her bluish appearance and thought it made her look pretty. You asked her name and got know the this amazing girl. You flew with her through the night sky enjoying every moment. A strange looking green triangle thing was giving you the finger salute for some reason.
1211.title: I'm just a simple ordinary human

choices: Peridot shows up and throws popcorn at you.
Steven and Garnett help you plan to have a wedding.
12111.content: She looks at you a bit startled at first but then starts to kiss you back harder. You both end up landing on the beach with your legs wrapped around her while her have a tight grip on your cute ass cheeks.
12111.title: Kiss her passionately

choices: Actually, show me a different superpower
1212.content:
So, you prefer to be someone with superpowers, huh? That's fine. After all, the Gems are pretty powerful to fight against. Now then, let's see which superpower should we take a gander at first, hmm? Oh! How about the power known as Organic Metal Skin?

ORGANIC METAL SKIN

For those who happen to be confused on what sort of power it is, Organic Metal Skin is the ability to have skin with organic cells that have metallic properties. It's known to be a variation of both the Dermal Armor ability and Bio-Metal Physiology.

Capabilities
According to the information at hand, the user has a body with an organic metal skin that can resist almost any attack, giving the user with this ability to have enhanced durability, along with possible hints of superhuman strength. Because of their living organic metal substance for body tissue, it is possible that the user can obtain immortality. However, the user may not always possess an organic metallic form, but are capable of transforming into such a form.

Applications
*Elasticity
*Natural Weaponry
*Organic Constructs
*Organic Metal Transmutation

Associations
*Bio-Metal Physiology
*Biological Manipulation
*Dermal Armor
*Metal Manipulation
*Metal Mimicry
*Trace Metal Manipulation

Known Users
Although not as popular or as common like other superpowers such as Flight, Superhuman Strength, or Regeneration, there are a few noteworthy users of the Organic Metal Skin ability, such as:
*Terminus (Marvel Comics)
*Ironclad (Marvel Comics)
*Predator X (Marvel Comics)
*Colossus (Marvel Comics)
*Senator Steven Armstrong (Metal Gear Rising: Revengeance)

Well, there you have it, ladies and gentlemen: Organic Metal Skin! So, do you choose to have this power, or should we move on to another superhuman ability?
1212.title: Being Superhuman

125.content: none catch your fancy yet? here are some more chooses.
125.title: More Gems, please!

12533122.content:
Okay, there are only two diamonds left. Which will it be?

Pink Diamond back from the dead?

OR

White Diamond, whom we have yet to see?
12533122.title: Last two diamonds.

info.brief_description: For those who like Steven Universe, then you've come to the right place!
info.description:
Now for those who wanted a girlfriend interactive story featuring the ladies from the Steven Universe series, then here it is, ladies and gentlemen!

And now for the rules:

1: Female characters only! However, that does not mean that there won't be any male characters appearing in the story.

2: No gross stuff

3: No drugs, etc.

4: No killing off the main character (that's you), or the girl of your choice.

5: If you're planning to have sex in a chapter, please give us a earning.

6: Just to add some variety, there will be an option to add new powers.

7: I would like it if you had the dialogue you have for the characters in different colors please, make things a little easier to read at times.

8: Go into detail when writing and adding new chapters, don't just write down a single sentence and call it a chapter.

9: Have Fun!
